Please pardon my dust....

This entire site is currently under construction at this time. You may see something break or some weird formatting happen overtime. I am currently developing this site and finalizing the details before making it offically public.

Feel free to check out what I am currently developing in the meantime!
Also, if you see a bug or have a suggestion, feel free to drop me an issue.

Thank you and have a great day!

⚠️ Oh wow! You have found a secret dev page!

Hey, congrats on finding a secret dev page I use to debug! This is the Liquid language debugger I use to test the Liquid language syntax for whatever I use Liquid for.

Why am I keeping this here in the live site you ask? Well, I want to make sure my local tests also works on my remote site as well! Plus, it is fun to have people see what happens behind the scenes to see how my website came together. :D
